mapper.select: select status from course_member where member=#{uid} and cno=#{cno}
select u_id, name, pid, avatar from user, course_member, permission where course_member.member=user.u_id and user.permission=permission.pid and course_member.cno=#{cno} and status!='2'

select course.cno, cname, school_year, semester, snum, archive, admin, name from course, user, course_member where course.cno=course_member.cno and course.admin=user.u_id and course_member.member=#{uid} and course.cdelete!=1 and course_member.status=0
mapper.insert: insert into course_member (cno, member, status) values (#{cno}, #{uid}, "0")
